message.content:
cs.HC, cs.LG, cs.VE, cs.ET, cs.CY 

The paper discusses the development of a virtual reality learning environment, which involves human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and machine learning (cs.LG) techniques to improve educational effectiveness. The paper also focuses on the use of virtual environments (cs.VE) and the implementation of flexible content and infrastructure (cs.ET) to meet established VLE standards. Finally, the paper discusses the use of social VR platforms (cs.CY) to create a more immersive learning experience.
